Full CV: Here

About Me

Hi, my name is Pinaki and I am an organic chemist with over 20 years of teaching and research experience in both academia and industry with more than 100 publications and over 2300 citations in highly reputed international journals.

I am currently teaching Chemistry at Royal Imperial Collegiate of Canada and am an editorial board member of Current Organic Chemistry, Bentham Science Publishers.

I am a resident of Niagara Falls, Ontario, Canada.

Awards and Publications

Friendship Award 2009

The biggest national award for foreign experts conferred by the government of P.R. China.

Published Book

Co-authored Environment-Friendly Antirviral Agents for Plants, Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg, 2010.

Select Publications

P.S. Bhadury* and Jun Pang (2015). Anti-Cancer Drug Design using Natural and Synthetic Pharmacophores. Curr. Org. Chem. 2015, vol. 19, no 15, 1460-1490, 31 pages, DOI:10.2174/1385272819666150525234749.

Bhadury, PS* and Sun, Z. (2014) Chiral Brønsted acid catalyzed transformations of electrophilic imines. Curr. Org. Chem. 2014, vol. 18, issue no 1, 127-150 (24 pages, Review paper as the first and corresponding author).

Kun Wen, Jinbo Chen, Feng Gao, Pinaki S. Bhadury, Erkang Fan and Zhihua Sun (2013). Metal free catalytic hydroboration of multiple bonds of methanol using N-heterocyclic carbene under open atmosphere. Org. Biomol. Chem., 11 (issue 37), 6350-6356.

Manping Zhao, Xiuli Zhang, Chengxiang He, Pinaki S. Bhadury, and Zhihua Sun (2014) A Facile Synthesis of Tris(indolyl)propanes by Concerted 1,2- and 1,4-Friedel-Crafts Attack of Indoles to α,β-Unsaturated Aldimines. Australian Journal of Chemistry; 68 (2), 327-334.

Bentham Science Publishers

Brand Bentham ambassador of Canada to promote Bentham Science publications.

Research Scienctist and R&D Manager

2014 - 2015

NorthernChem Inc.

Worked as Research and Development manager/scientist to develop newer methodologies for anti-cancer drugs-supervised co-op students from Canadian Universities

Professor and Foreign Expert

2013

Shanghai University of Engineering Science

Held full professorship, supervised and taught under-graduate and post-graduate students in medicinal and organic chemistry.

Professor and Foreign Expert

2006 - 2012

Guizhou University

Held full professorship, researched organic chemistry at the highest level. Taught Advanced Organic Chemistry and General Chemistry to Master and Doctoral students of the university. Supervised master and doctorate students for their dissertations in medicinal, organic and pesticidal chemistry. Also awarded “Friendship Award, 2009”, the biggest national award for Foreign experts for outstanding research, conferred by the Govt. of China.

Dartmouth College
